text: Ojo muşrikon dar zamin gardiş nakardaand, to ʙuʙinand sarançomi kasone, ki peş az onon ʙudand, ci guna ʙudaast? On aqvomi guzaşta nerumandtar az inho ʙudand va osoru ʙinohoi ʙeştare dar zamin padid ovardand, ammo Alloh taolo ononro ʙa [saʙaʙi] gunohonaşon azoʙ kard, dar hole ki dar ʙaroʙari [azoʙi] Alloh taolo heç [jor va] mudofe'e nadoştand
